entry.label: Voice
entry.description: Telephone provides voice service

entry.label: Facsimile
entry.description: Telephone provides facsimile service

entry.label: SMS
entry.description: Telephone provides sms service

entry.label: creatie
entry.description: Datum waarop de dataset of dataset serie is gecreìerd.

entry.label: publicatie
entry.description: Publicatie datum waarop de dataset of dataset serie is gepubliceerd.

entry.label: revisie
entry.description: Datum waarop de dataset of dataset serie is gecontroleerd, verbeterd of gewijzigd.

entry.label: Expiry
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource expires

entry.label: Last Update
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource was last updated

entry.label: Last Revision
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource was last reviewed

entry.label: Next Update
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource will be next updated

entry.label: Unavailable
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource became not available or obtainable

entry.label: In Force
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource became in force

entry.label: Adopted
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource was adopted

entry.label: Deprecated
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource was deprecated

entry.label: Superseded
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource was superseded or replaced by another resource

entry.label: Validity Begins
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource is considered to be valid

entry.label: Validity Expires
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource is no longer considered to be valid

entry.label: Released
entry.description: Date identifies when the resource shall be released for public access

entry.label: Distribution
entry.description: Date identifies when an instance of the resource was distributed

entry.label: download
entry.description: online instructions for transferring data from one storage device or system to another

entry.label: information
entry.description: online information about the resource

entry.label: offlineAccess
entry.description: online instructions for requesting the resource from the provider

entry.label: order
entry.description: online order process for obtening the resource

entry.label: search
entry.description: online search interface for seeking out information about the resource

entry.label: Complete Metadata
entry.description: Complete metadata provided

entry.label: Browse Graphic
entry.description: Browse Graphic provided

entry.label: Upload
entry.description: Upload service provided

entry.label: Email Service
entry.description: Email service provided

entry.label: Browsing
entry.description: Online browsing provided

entry.label: Access File
entry.description: Online file access provided

entry.label: documentDigital
entry.description: digital representation of a primarily textual item (can contain illustrations also)

entry.label: imageDigital
entry.description: likeness of natural or man-made features, objects, and activities acquired through the sensing of visual or any other segment of the electromagnetic spectrum by sensors, such as thermal infrared, and high resolution radar and stored in digital format

entry.label: documentHardcopy
entry.description: representation of a primarily textual item (can contain illustrations also) on paper, photographic material, or other media

entry.label: imageHardcopy
entry.description: likeness of natural or man-made features, objects, and activities acquired through the sensing of visual or any other segment of the electromagnetic spectrum by sensors, such as thermal infrared, and high resolution radar and reproduced on paper, photographic material, or other media for use directly by the human user

entry.label: mapDigital
entry.description: map represented in raster or vector form

entry.label: mapHardcopy
entry.description: map printed on paper, photographic material, or other media for use directly by the human user

entry.label: modelDigital
entry.description: multi-dimensional digital representation of a feature, process, etc.

entry.label: modelHardcopy
entry.description: 3-dimensional, physical model

entry.label: profileDigital
entry.description: vertical cross-section in digital form

entry.label: profileHardcopy
entry.description: vertical cross-section printed on paper, etc.

entry.label: tableDigital
entry.description: digital representation of facts or figures systematically displayed, especially in columns

entry.label: tableHardcopy
entry.description: representation of facts or figures systematically displayed, especially in columns, printed onpapers, photographic material, or other media

entry.label: videoDigital
entry.description: digital video recording

entry.label: videoHardcopy
entry.description: video recording on film

entry.label: Digital audio
entry.description: Digital audio recording

entry.label: Hardcopy audio
entry.description: Audio recording delivered by analog media, such as magnetic tape

entry.label: Multimedia digital
entry.description: Information representation using simultaneously various digital modes for text, sound and image

entry.label: Multimedia hardcopy
entry.description: Information representation using simultaneously various analog modes for text, sound and image

entry.label: Physical object
entry.description: A physical object eg. rock or mineral sample, microscope slide

entry.label: Digital diagram
entry.description: Information represented graphically by charts such as pie chart, bar chart and other type of diagrams and recorded in digital format

entry.label: Hardcopy diagram
entry.description: Information represented graphically by charts such as pie chart, bar chart and other type of diagrams and printed on paper, photographic material, or other media

entry.label: verstrekker
entry.description: Organisatie die de data verstrekt.

entry.label: beheerder
entry.description: Partij die verantwoordelijkheid heeft geaccepteerd en zorg draagt voor het beheer van de data.

entry.label: eigenaar
entry.description: Partij die eigenaar is van de data.

entry.label: gebruiker
entry.description: Partij die de data gebruikt.

entry.label: distributeur
entry.description: Partij die de data verstrekt.

entry.label: maker
entry.description: Partij die de data heeft gecreìerd

entry.label: contactpunt
entry.description: Partij waarmee contact kan worden opgenomen voor het vergaren van kennis of verstrekking van de data.

entry.label: inwinner
entry.description: Sleutelpartij verantwoordelijk voor verzamelen van data en de uitvoering van onderzoek.

entry.label: bewerker
entry.description: Partij die de data heeft bewerkt, zodanig dat de data is gewijzigd.

entry.label: uitgever
entry.description: Partij die de data publiceert.

entry.label: auteur
entry.description: Partij die auteur is van de data.

entry.label: Sponsor
entry.description: Party who speaks for the resource

entry.label: Co-author
entry.description: Party who jointly authors the resource

entry.label: Collaborator
entry.description: Party who assists with the generation of the resource other than the principal investigator

entry.label: Editor
entry.description: Party who reviewed or modified the resource to improve the content

entry.label: Mediator
entry.description: A class of entity that mediates access to the resource and for whom the resource is intended or useful

entry.label: Rights holder
entry.description: Party owning or managing rights over the resource

entry.label: Contributor
entry.description: Party contributing to the resource

entry.label: Funder
entry.description: Party providing monetary support for the resource

entry.label: Stakeholder
entry.description: Party who has an interest in the resource or the use of the resource

entry.label: directInternal
entry.description: method of evaluating the quality of a dataset based on inspection of items within the dataset, where all data required is internal to the dataset being evaluated

entry.label: directExternal
entry.description: method of evaluating the quality of a dataset based on inspection of items within the dataset, where reference data external to the dataset being evaluated is required

entry.label: indirect
entry.description: method of evaluating the quality of a dataset based on external knowledge

entry.label: Kruis verwijzing
entry.description: Referentie van een dataset naar een andere

entry.label: Stereo mate
entry.description: Deel van een set afbeeldingen die samen een 3D beeld vormen

entry.label: Is composed of
entry.description: Reference to resources that are parts of this resource

entry.label: Collective Title
entry.description: Common title for a collection of resources. NOTE Title identifies elements of a series collectively, combined with information about what volumes are available at the source cite

entry.label: Series
entry.description: Associated through a common heritage such as produced to a common product specification

entry.label: Dependency
entry.description: Associated through a dependency

entry.label: Revision Of
entry.description: Resource is a revision of associated resource

entry.label: Collectie
entry.description: accumulation of datasets assembled for a specific purpose

entry.label: Ordinary
entry.description: Indicates an ordinary association.

entry.label: Aggregation
entry.description: Indicates a UML aggregation (part role).

entry.label: Composition
entry.description: Indicates a UML composition (part role).

entry.label: vrij toegankelijk
entry.description: Beschikbaar voor algemene ontsluiting.

entry.label: niet toegankelijk
entry.description: Niet geschikt voor algemene ontsluiting.

entry.label: vertrouwelijk
entry.description: Beschikbaar voor personen die vertrouwd kan omgaan met de informatie.

entry.label: geheim
entry.description: Dient geheim en verborgen te worden gehouden voor iedereen behalve een geselecteerde groep personen.

entry.label: zeer geheim
entry.description: Hoogste geheimhouding verplicht.

entry.label: For Official Use Only
entry.description: Unclassified information that is to be used only for official purposes determined by the designating body

entry.label: Protected
entry.description: Compromise of the information could cause damage

entry.label: Limited Distribution
entry.description: Dissemination limited by designating body

entry.label: image
entry.description: meaningful numerical representation of a physical parameter that is not the actual value of the physical parameter

entry.label: thematicClassification
entry.description: code value with no quantitative meaning, used to represent a physical quantity

entry.label: physicalMeasurement
entry.description: value in physical units of the quantity being measured

entry.label: Auxillary Information
entry.description: Data, usually a physical measurement, used to support the calculation of the primary physicalMeasurement coverages in the dataset. EXAMPLE: Grid of aerosol optical thickness used in the calculation of a sea surface temperature product

entry.label: Quality Information
entry.description: Data used to characterize the quality of the physicalMeasurement coverages in the dataset. NOTE: Typically included in a gmi:QE_CoverageResult

entry.label: Reference Information
entry.description: Data used to characterize the quality of the physicalMeasurement coverages in the dataset. NOTE: Typically included in a gmi:QE_CoverageResult

entry.label: Model Result
entry.description: Resources with values that are calculated using a model rather than being observed or calculated from observations

entry.label: Coordinate
entry.description: Data used to provide coordinate axis values

entry.label: class
entry.description: descriptor of a set of objects that share the same attributes, operations, methods, relationships, and behavior

entry.label: codelist
entry.description: descriptor of a set of objects that share the same attributes, operations, methods, relationships, and behavior

entry.label: enumeration
entry.description: data type whose instances form a list of named literal values, not extendable

entry.label: codelistElement
entry.description: permissible value for a codelist or enumeration

entry.label: abstractClass
entry.description: class that cannot be directly instantiated

entry.label: aggregateClass
entry.description: class that is composed of classes it is connected to by an aggregate relationship

entry.label: specifiedClass
entry.description: subclass that may be substituted for its superclass

entry.label: datatypeClass
entry.description: class with few or no operations whose primary purpose is to hold the abstract state of another class for transmittal, storage, encoding or persistent storage

entry.label: interfaceClass
entry.description: named set of operations that characterize the behavior of an element

entry.label: unionClass
entry.description: class describing a selection of one of the specified types

entry.label: metaClass
entry.description: class whose instances are classes

entry.label: typeClass
entry.description: class used for specification of a domain of instances (objects), together with the operations applicable to the objects. A type may have attributes and associations

entry.label: characterString
entry.description: free text field

entry.label: integer
entry.description: numerical field

entry.label: association
entry.description: semantic relationship between two classes that involves connections among their instances

entry.label: row
entry.description: ordinate (y) axis

entry.label: column
entry.description: abscissa (x) axis

entry.label: vertical
entry.description: vertical (z) axis

entry.label: track
entry.description: along the direction of motion of the scan point

entry.label: crossTrack
entry.description: perpendicular to the direction of motion of the scan point

entry.label: line
entry.description: scan line of a sensor

entry.label: sample
entry.description: element along a scan line

entry.label: time
entry.description: duration

entry.label: complex
entry.description: set of geometric primitives such that their boundaries can be represented as a union of other primitives

entry.label: composite
entry.description: connected set of curves, solids or surfaces

entry.label: curve
entry.description: bounded, 1-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a line

entry.label: point
entry.description: zero-dimensional geometric primitive, representing a position but not having an extent

entry.label: solid
entry.description: bounded, connected 3-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a region of space

entry.label: surface
entry.description: bounded, connected 2-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a region of a plane

entry.label: blurredImage
entry.description: portion of the image is blurred

entry.label: cloud
entry.description: portion of the image is partially obscured by cloud cover

entry.label: degradingObliquity
entry.description: acute angle between the plane of the ecliptic (the plane of the Earth s orbit) and the plane of the celestial equator

entry.label: fog
entry.description: portion of the image is partially obscured by fog

entry.label: heavySmokeOrDust
entry.description: portion of the image is partially obscured by heavy smoke or dust

entry.label: night
entry.description: image was taken at night

entry.label: rain
entry.description: image was taken during rainfall

entry.label: semiDarkness
entry.description: image was taken during semi-dark conditions -- twilight conditions

entry.label: shadow
entry.description: portion of the image is obscured by shadow

entry.label: snow
entry.description: portion of the image is obscured by snow

entry.label: terrainMasking
entry.description: the absence of collection data of a given point or area caused by the relative location of topographic features which obstruct the collection path between the collector(s) and the subject(s) of interest

entry.label: discipline
entry.description: keyword identifies a branch of instruction or specialized learning

entry.label: place
entry.description: keyword identifies a location

entry.label: stratum
entry.description: keyword identifies the layer(s) of any deposited substance

entry.label: temporal
entry.description: keyword identifies a time period related to the dataset

entry.label: theme
entry.description: keyword identifies a particular subject or topic

entry.label: Data centre
entry.description: Keyword identifies a repository or archive that manages and distributes data

entry.label: Feature type
entry.description: Keyword identifies a resource containing or about a collection of feature instances with common characteristics

entry.label: Instrument
entry.description: Keyword identifies a device used to measure or compare physical properties

entry.label: Platform
entry.description: Keyword identifies a structure upon which an instrument is mounted

entry.label: Process
entry.description: Keyword identifies a series of actions or natural occurrences

entry.label: Project
entry.description: Keyword identifies an endeavour undertaken to create or modify a product or service

entry.label: Service
entry.description: Keyword identifies an activity carried out by one party for the benefit of another

entry.label: Product
entry.description: Keyword identifies a type of product

entry.label: Sub-Topic Category
entry.description: Refinement of a topic category for the purpose of geographic data classification

entry.label: Taxon
entry.description: Keyword identifies a taxonomy of the resource

entry.label: continu
entry.description: Data wordt herhaaldelijk en vaak geactualiseerd.

entry.label: dagelijks
entry.description: Data wordt elke dag geactualiseerd.

entry.label: wekelijks
entry.description: Data wordt wekelijks geactualiseerd.

entry.label: 2-wekelijks
entry.description: Data wordt 2-wekelijks geactualiseerd.

entry.label: maandelijks
entry.description: Data wordt maandelijks geactualiseerd.

entry.label: 1 x per kwartaal
entry.description: Data wordt elke kwartaal geactualiseerd.

entry.label: 1 x per half jaar
entry.description: Data wordt half jaarlijks geactualiseerd.

entry.label: jaarlijks
entry.description: Data wordt jaarlijks geactualiseerd.

entry.label: indien nodig
entry.description: Data wordt geactualiseerd indien nodig.

entry.label: onregelmatig
entry.description: Data wordt geactualiseerd in intervallen die niet even lang duren.

entry.label: niet gepland
entry.description: Er zijn geen plannen om de data te actualiseren.

entry.label: onbekend
entry.description: Herzieningsfrequentie is niet bekend.

entry.label: Periodic
entry.description: Resource is updated at regular intervals

entry.label: Semi-monthly
entry.description: Resource updated twice monthly

entry.label: Biennially
entry.description: Resource is updated every 2 years

entry.label: cpio
entry.description: CoPy In / Out (UNIX file format and command)

entry.label: tar
entry.description: Tape ARchive

entry.label: highSierra
entry.description: high sierra file system

entry.label: iso9660
entry.description: information processing volume and file structure of CD-ROM

entry.label: iso9660RockRidge
entry.description: rock ridge interchange protocol (UNIX)

entry.label: iso9660AppleHFS
entry.description: hierarchical file system (Macintosh)

entry.label: UDF
entry.description: Universal Disk Format

entry.label: mandatory
entry.description: element is always required

entry.label: optional
entry.description: element is not required

entry.label: conditional
entry.description: element is required when a specific condition is met

entry.label: center
entry.description: point halfway between the lower left and the upper right of the pixel

entry.label: lowerLeft
entry.description: the corner in the pixel closest to the origin of the SRS; if two are at the same distance from the origin, the one with the smallest x-value

entry.label: lowerRight
entry.description: next corner counterclockwise from the lower left

entry.label: upperRight
entry.description: next corner counterclockwise from the lower right

entry.label: upperLeft
entry.description: next corner counterclockwise from the upper right

entry.label: compleet
entry.description: Productie van de data is compleet / afgerond.

entry.label: historisch archief
entry.description: De data is opgeslagen in een offline opslagmedium.

entry.label: niet relevant
entry.description: Data is niet langer relevant.

entry.label: continu geactualiseerd
entry.description: Data wordt continu geactualiseerd.

entry.label: gepland
entry.description: Datum is al bekend wanneer de data gecreéerd of geactualiseerd moet zijn.

entry.label: actualisatie vereist
entry.description: Data moet nog gegenereerd of geactualiseerd worden.

entry.label: in ontwikkeling
entry.description: Data wordt momenteel gecreéerd.

entry.label: Final
entry.description: Progress concluded and no changes will be accepted

entry.label: Pending
entry.description: Committed to, but not yet addressed

entry.label: Retired
entry.description: Item is no longer recommended for use. It has not been superseded by another item

entry.label: Superseded
entry.description: Replaced by new item

entry.label: Tentative
entry.description: Provisional changes likely before resource becomes final or complete

entry.label: Valid
entry.description: Acceptable under specific conditions

entry.label: Accepted
entry.description: Agreed to by sponsor

entry.label: Not Accepted
entry.description: Rejected by sponsor

entry.label: Withdrawn
entry.description: Withdrawn

entry.label: Proposed
entry.description: Suggested that development needs to be undertaken

entry.label: Deprecated
entry.description: Resource superseded and will become obsolete, use only for historical purposes

entry.label: copyright
entry.description: Exclusief recht voor publicatie, productie, of verkoop van rechten op een literair, theater, muzikaal of artistiek werk, of op het gebruik van een commerciéle druk of label, toegekend bij wet voor een specifieke periode of tijd aan een auteur, componist, artiest of distributeur.

entry.label: patent
entry.description: Overheid heeft een exclusief recht toegekend om een uitvinding te maken, verkopen, gebruiken of in licentie uit te geven.

entry.label: patent in wording
entry.description: Geproduceerde of verkochte informatie wachtend op een patent.

entry.label: merknaam
entry.description: Een naam, symbool of ander object om een product te identificeren, wat officieel geregistreerd is en gebruik wettelijk voorbehouden is aan de eigenaar of fabrikant.

entry.label: licentie
entry.description: Formele toestemming of iets te doen.

entry.label: intellectueel eigendom
entry.description: Recht op een financieel voordeel van en controle hebben op de distributie een niet tastbaar eigendom wat het resultaat is van creativiteit.

entry.label: niet toegankelijk
entry.description: Verbod op distributie en gebruik.

entry.label: anders
entry.description: Restrictie niet opgenomen in lijst.

entry.label: Unrestricted
entry.description: No constraints exist

entry.label: Licence Unrestricted
entry.description: formal permission not required to use the resource

entry.label: Licence End User
entry.description: Formal permission required for a person or an entity to use the resource and that may differ from the person that orders or purchases it

entry.label: Licence Distributor
entry.description: Formal permission required for a person or an entity to commercialize or distribute the resource

entry.label: Private
entry.description: Protects rights of individual or organisations from observation, intrusion, or attention of others

entry.label: Statutory
entry.description: Prescribed by law

entry.label: Confidential
entry.description: Not available to the public. NOTE: Contains information that could be prejudicial to a commercial, industrial, or national interest

entry.label: Sensitive But Unclassified
entry.description: Although unclassified, requires strict controls over its distribution

entry.label: In-Confidence
entry.description: With trust

entry.label: attribute
entry.description: information applies to the attribute class

entry.label: attributeType
entry.description: information applies to the characteristic of a feature

entry.label: collectionHardware
entry.description: information applies to the collection hardware class

entry.label: collectionSession
entry.description: information applies to the collection session

entry.label: dataset
entry.description: Informatie heeft betrekking op de dataset.

entry.label: series
entry.description: Informatie heeft betrekking op de serie.

entry.label: nonGeographicDataset
entry.description: information applies to non-geographic data

entry.label: dimensionGroup
entry.description: information applies to a dimension group

entry.label: feature
entry.description: information applies to a feature

entry.label: featureType
entry.description: information applies to a feature type

entry.label: propertyType
entry.description: information applies to a property type

entry.label: fieldSession
entry.description: information applies to a field session

entry.label: software
entry.description: information applies to a computer program or routine

entry.label: service
entry.description: information applies to a capability which a service provider entity makes available to a service user entity through a set of interfaces that define a behaviour, such as a use case

entry.label: model
entry.description: information applies to a copy or imitation of an existing or hypothetical object

entry.label: tile
entry.description: information applies to a tile, a spatial subset of geographic data

entry.label: Metadata
entry.description: Information applies to metadata

entry.label: Initiative
entry.description: Information applies to an initiative

entry.label: Sample
entry.description: Information applies to a sample

entry.label: Document
entry.description: Information applies to a document

entry.label: Repository
entry.description: Information applies to a repository

entry.label: Aggregate
entry.description: Information applies to an aggregate resource

entry.label: Product
entry.description: Metadata describing an ISO 19131 data product specification

entry.label: Collection
entry.description: Information applies to an unstructured set

entry.label: Coverage
entry.description: Information applies to a coverage

entry.label: Application
entry.description: Information resource hosted on a specific set of hardware and accessible over a network

entry.label: vector
entry.description: Vector data wordt gebruikt om geografische data te representeren.

entry.label: grid
entry.description: Grid data wordt gebruikt om geografische data te representeren.

entry.label: tekstTabel
entry.description: Tekstuele of tabel data wordt gebruikt om geografische data te representeren.

entry.label: tin
entry.description: Triangulated irregular network.

entry.label: stereoModel
entry.description: 3D overzicht wordt gevormd door intersectie van twee kernstralen van twee overlappende beelden.

entry.label: video
entry.description: Scène uit een video opname.

entry.label: landbouw en veeteelt
entry.description: Houden van dieren en/of verbouwen van planten. Vb: landbouw, irrigatie, ziekten die gewassen aantasten.

entry.label: biota
entry.description: Flora en fauna in natuurlijke omgeving. Vb: habitats, ecologie.

entry.label: grenzen
entry.description: Wettelijke gebiedsbeschrijvingen. Vb: politieke en administratieve grenzen.

entry.label: klimatologie, meteorologie atmosfeer
entry.description: Processen en fenomenen in de atmosfeer. Vb: wolkbedekking, weer, klimaat verandering.

entry.label: economie
entry.description: Economische activiteiten, condities en werkgelegenheid. Vb: Werkgelegenheid, industrie, toerisme, olie- en gasvelden, bosbouw, visserij.

entry.label: hoogte
entry.description: Hoogte boven of onder zeeniveau. Vb: hoogtekaart, DEM, hellingen.

entry.label: natuur en milieu
entry.description: Natuurlijke bronnen, bescherming en beheer. Vb: milieuverontreiniging, landschap, natuurlijke reserves, vuilopslag.

entry.label: Geo wetenschappelijke data
entry.description: Data die behoort tot een aardwetenschap. Vb: geologie, mineralen, structuur van de aarde, zwaartekrachtskaart, grondstoffen, erosie.

entry.label: gezondheid
entry.description: Gezondheid(szorg), menselijke ecologie en veiligheid. Vb: ziekten, hygiéne, gezondheidszorg.

entry.label: referentie materiaal aardbedekking
entry.description: Basiskaarten. Vb: landbedekking, topografische kaarten, foto's, ongeclassificeerde kaarten.

entry.label: militair
entry.description: Militaire basissen, structuren en activiteiten. Vb: barakken, oefenterreinen, militaire transporten.

entry.label: binnenwater
entry.description: Binnenwater, drainagesystemen en hun karakteristieken. Vb: Rivieren en gletsjers, dijken, stromen, waterzuiveringsinstallaties, overloopgebieden.

entry.label: locatie
entry.description: Positionele informatie en services. Vb: adressen, geodetisch netwerk, postcode gebieden, plaatsnamen, controlepunten.

entry.label: oceanen
entry.description: Gebieden met zoutwaterlichamen (niet binnenlands). Vb: Getijden, tsunami's, kustinformatie, riffen.

entry.label: planning kadaster
entry.description: Informatie die gebruikt wordt voor nodige planmatige activiteiten. Vb: Landgebruik, kadastrale informatie.

entry.label: maatschappij
entry.description: Kenmerken van maatschappij en culturen. Vb: antropologie, archeologie, criminaliteit, gewoonten, nederzettingen, onderwijs.

entry.label: (civiele) structuren
entry.description: Civiele werken (door mensen gemaakte structuren). Gebouwen, musea, kerken, winkels, torens.

entry.label: transport
entry.description: Middelen voor vervoer van goederen en/of personen. Vb: Wegen, Vliegvelden, tunnels, spoorwegen.

entry.label: nutsbedrijven communicatie
entry.description: Energie, waterleidingen en riolering en communicatie infrastructuren en services. Vb: elektriciteit- en gasdistributie, waterzuivering en verstrekking, telecommunicatie, radio.

entry.label: Extra Terrestrial
entry.description: Region more than 100 km above the surface of the Earth

entry.label: Disaster
entry.description: Information related to disasters EXAMPLES: Site of the disaster, evacuation zone, disaster-prevention facility, disaster relief activities

entry.label: Alleen geometrie
entry.description: geometry objects without any additional structure which describes topology

entry.label: 1D topologie
entry.description: 1-dimensional topological complex -- commonly called chain-node topology

entry.label: Planar Graph
entry.description: 1-dimensional topological complex that is planar. (A planar graph is a graph that can be drawn in a plane in such a way that no two edges intersect except at a vertex.)

entry.label: Full Planar Graph
entry.description: 2-dimensional topological complex that is planar. (A 2-dimensional topological complex is commonly called full topology in a cartographic 2D environment.)

entry.label: Surface Graph
entry.description: 1-dimensional topological complex that is isomorphic to a subset of a surface. (A geometric complex is isomorphic to a topological complex if their elements are in a one-to-one, dimensional-and boundry-preserving correspondence to one another.)

entry.label: Full Surface Graph
entry.description: 2-dimensional topological complex that is isomorphic to a subset of a surface

entry.label: 3D Topologie
entry.description: 3-dimensional topological complex. (A topological complex is a collection of topological primitives that are closed under the boundary operations.)

entry.label: Full 3D Topologie
entry.description: complete coverage of a 3D Euclidean coordinate space

entry.label: abstract
entry.description: topological complex without any specified geometric realisation

entry.label: 3db
entry.description: TBD

entry.label: Half Maximum
entry.description: Description: width of a distribution equal to the distance between the outer two points on the distribution having power level half of that at the peak

entry.label: Fifty Percent
entry.description: Description: wavelength difference between the upper and lower bounds at the 50% (-3db) points of the sensor spectral response

entry.label: One Over E
entry.description: TBD

entry.label: Equivalent Width
entry.description: TBD

entry.label: Acquisition
entry.description: Event related to a specific collection

entry.label: Pass
entry.description: Event related to general collection

entry.label: Way Point
entry.description: Event related to general collection

entry.label: Areal
entry.description: Collection of a geographic area defined by a polygon (coverage)

entry.label: Strip
entry.description: Series of linear collections grouped by way points

entry.label: Instantaneous Collection
entry.description: Single instance of collection

entry.label: Persistent View
entry.description: Multiple instances of collection

entry.label: Survey
entry.description: Comparative collection

entry.label: Critical
entry.description: Decisive importance

entry.label: High Importance
entry.description: Requires resources to be made available

entry.label: Medium Importance
entry.description: Normal operation priority

entry.label: Low Importance
entry.description: To be completed when resources are available

entry.label: Start
entry.description: Beginning of a collection

entry.label: End
entry.description: End of a collection

entry.label: Instantaneous
entry.description: Collection without a significant duration

entry.label: Automatic
entry.description: Event due to external stimuli

entry.label: Manual
entry.description: Event manually instigated

entry.label: PreProgrammed
entry.description: Event instigated by planned stimuli

entry.label: Input
entry.description: The parameter is an input parameter to the service instance

entry.label: Output
entry.description: The parameter is an output parameter to the service instance

entry.label: Input/output
entry.description: The parameter is both an input and output parameter to the service instance

entry.label: Compound Engineering Parametric
entry.description: Compound spatio-parametric coordinate reference system containing an engineering coordinate reference system and a parametric reference system EXAMPLE: [local] x, y, pressure

entry.label: Compound Engineering Parametric Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-parametric-temporal coordinate reference system containing an engineering, a parametric, and a temporal coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: [local] x, y, pressure, time

entry.label: Compound Engineering Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing an engineering and a temporal coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: [local] x, y, time

entry.label: Compound Engineering Vertical
entry.description: Compound spatial reference system containing a horizontal engineering coordinate reference system and a vertical coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: [local] x, y, height

entry.label: Compound Engineering Vertical Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing an engineering, a vertical, and a temporal coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: [local] x, y, height, time

entry.label: Compound Geographic 2D Parametric
entry.description: Compound spatio-parametric coordinate reference system containing a 2 dimensional geographic horizontal coordinate reference system and a parametric reference system EXAMPLE: latitude, longitude, pressure

entry.label: Compound Geographic 2D Parametric Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-parametric-temporal coordinate reference system containing a 2 dimensional geographic horizontal, a parametric and a temporal coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: latitude, longitude, pressure, time

entry.label: Compound Geographic 2D Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing a 2 dimensional geographic horizontal coordinate reference system and a temporal reference system EXAMPLE: latitude, longitude, time

entry.label: Compound Geographic 2D Vertical
entry.description: Compound coordinate reference system in which one constituent coordinate reference system is a horizontal geodetic coordinate reference system and one is a vertical coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: latitude, longitude, [gravity-related] height or depth

entry.label: Compound Geographic 2D Vertical Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing a 2 dimensional geographic horizontal, a vertical, and a temporal coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: latitude, longitude, height, time

entry.label: Compound Geographic 3D Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing a 3 dimensional geographic and a temporal coordinate reference system EXAMPLE latitude, longitude, ellipsoidal height, time

entry.label: Compound Projected 2D Parametric
entry.description: Compound spatio-parametric coordinate reference system containing a projected horizontal coordinate reference system and a parametric reference system EXAMPLE: easting, northing, density

entry.label: Compound Projected 2D Parametric Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-parametric-temporal coordinate reference system containing a projected horizontal, a parametric, and a temporal coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: easting, northing, density, time

entry.label: Compound Projected Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing a projected horizontal and a temporal coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: easting, northing, time

entry.label: Compound Projected Vertical
entry.description: Compound spatial reference system containing a horizontal projected coordinate reference system and a vertical coordinate reference system EXAMPLE easting, northing, [gravity-related] height or depth

entry.label: Compound Projected Vertical Temporal
entry.description: Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing a projected horizontal, a vertical, and a temporal coordinate reference system EXAMPLE: easting, northing, height, time

entry.label: Engineering
entry.description: Coordinate reference system based on an engineering datum (datum describing the relationship of a coordinate system to a local reference) EXAMPLE: [local] x,y

entry.label: Engineering Design
entry.description: Engineering coordinate reference system in which the base representation of a moving object is specified EXAMPLE: [local] x,y

entry.label: Engineering Image
entry.description: Coordinate reference system based on an image datum (engineering datum which defines the relationship of a coordinate system to an image) EXAMPLE: row, column

entry.label: Geodetic Geocentric
entry.description: Geodetic CRS having a Cartesian 3D coordinate system EXAMPLE: [geocentric] X,Y,Z

entry.label: Geodetic Geographic 2D
entry.description: Geodetic CRS having an ellipsoidal 2D coordinate system EXAMPLE: latitude, longitude

entry.label: Geodetic Geographic 3D
entry.description: Geodetic CRS having an ellipsoidal 3D coordinate system EXAMPLE: latitude, longitude, ellipsoidal height

entry.label: Geographic Identifier
entry.description: Spatial reference in the form of a label or code that identifies a location EXAMPLE: post code

entry.label: Linear
entry.description: Reference system that identifies a location by reference to a segment of a linear geographic feature and distance along that segment from a given point EXAMPLE: x km along road

entry.label: Parametric
entry.description: Coordinate reference system based on a parametric datum (datum describing the relationship of a parametric coordinate system to an object) EXAMPLE: pressure

entry.label: Projected
entry.description: Coordinate reference system derived from a two-dimensional geodetic coordinate reference system by applying a map projection EXAMPLE: easting, northing

entry.label: Temporal
entry.description: Reference system against which time is measured EXAMPLE: time

entry.label: Vertical
entry.description: One-dimensional coordinate reference system based on a vertical datum (datum describing the relation of gravity-related heights or depths to the Earth) EXAMPLE: [gravity-related] height or depth

entry.label: point
entry.description: each cell represents a point

entry.label: area
entry.description: each cell represents an area

entry.label: Voxel
entry.description: Each cell represents a volumetric measurement on a regular grid in three dimensional space

entry.label: Stratum
entry.description: Height range for a single point vertical profile

entry.label: cdRom
entry.description: read-only optical disk

entry.label: dvd
entry.description: digital versatile disk

entry.label: dvdRom
entry.description: digital versatile disk, read only

entry.description: 3,5 inch magnetic disk

entry.label: 5quarterInchFloppy
entry.description: 5,25 inch magnetic disk

entry.description: 7 track magnetic tape

entry.label: 9trackType
entry.description: 9 track magnetic tape

entry.description: 4 millimetre magnetic tape

entry.description: 8 millimetre magnetic tape

entry.label: 1quarterInchCartridgeTape
entry.description: 0,25 inch magnetic tape

entry.label: digitalLinearTap
entry.description: half inch cartridge streaming tape drive

entry.label: onLine
entry.description: direct computer linkage

entry.label: satellite
entry.description: linkage through a satellite communication system

entry.label: telephoneLink
entry.description: communication through a telephone network

entry.label: hardcopy
entry.description: pamphlet or leaflet giving descriptive information

entry.label: ucs2
entry.description: 16-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO/IEC 10646

entry.label: ucs4
entry.description: 32-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO/IEC 10646

entry.label: utf7
entry.description: 7-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

entry.label: utf8
entry.description: 8-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

entry.label: utf16
entry.description: 16-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

entry.description: ISO/IEC 8859-1, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 1 : Latin alphabet No.1

entry.label: 8859part13

entry.description: japanese code set used for electronic transmission

entry.description: japanese code set used on UNIX based machines

entry.description: United States ASCII code set (ISO 646 US)

entry.label: big5

entry.label: GB2312
entry.description: simplified Chinese code set

entry.label: loose
entry.description: Een service instance die niet gekoppeld is met een specifieke dataset of dataset serie. Looselycoupled services zouden een associatie kunnen hebben met een datatype door de serviceType definitie. Metadata voor data wordt niet geleverd in de service metadata.

entry.label: mixed
entry.description: Een service instance die gekoppeld is met een specifieke dataset of dataset serie. Service metadata dienen zowel de service als geografische dataset te beschrijven (door middel van ISO 19115). Daarnaast kan deze service instance ook gebruikt worden met externe data (data die niet wordt beschreven door de operatesOn klasse).

entry.label: tight
entry.description: Een service instance die gekoppeld is met een specifieke dataset of dataset serie. Service metadata dienen zowel de service als geografische dataset te beschrijven (door middel van ISO 19115).
